features: Safety and Longevity: Gemmicc Magnetic Tiles are expertly crafted from non-toxic and robust ABS plastic. Their rounded corners ensure your children's hands remain unharmed. With the utilization of cutting-edge ultrasonic welding technology in our manufacturing process, imperfections are a thing of the past. Rest assured about your kids' safety and watch as their limitless creativity and imagination flourish without bounds.

Nice Starter Set: This magnetic building block set features 34 PCS magnet tiles,1 idea book for added fun, and we never compromise on quality, every piece is self-produced and checked one by one.This set is the ultimate choice for beginners ready to take their first step into the realm of magnetic building.

STEM Approved Toy: Gemmicc Magnetic tiles set is perfect for classroom, family, kindergarten, day care centers etc. This toys set can help enhance your kids’ fine motor skills, color and shape recognition ability, Children can build anything they imagine, from 2D planar shapes to 3D geometry, your children will feel a sense of accomplishment during the play.

Powerful Magnetism, Build Bigger: These magnetic building blocks feature larger magnets, delivering heightened magnetism for your child's creations. With this increased strength, your children can construct towering and expansive structures. Encourage them to dream big and build on a grand scale. Ideal for children aged 3 to 9, these blocks make for a wonderful gift idea for birthdays or Christmas, fostering imagination and play.

First grade customer service: Don't hesitate to reach out to us if you encounter any quality issues. Our responsive service team will swiftly address your concerns, offering a rapid solution. We're prepared to replace your set with a new one or provide a refund if any problems arise in relation to our toys.
body.description: Versatile Learning with Magnetic Building Blocks These magnetic building blocks serve multiple purposes, aiding in sorting and stacking. These activities contribute to kids' mathematical understanding while also fostering their grasp of various shapes and colors. Beyond that, the blocks facilitate learning about construction, all the while igniting imagination and nurturing creativity. A thoughtful gift choice for birthdays or Christmas.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Invest in STEM Toys to Fuel Your Child's Curiosity Suitable for children of all genders, starting from the age of 3 and above, these building games offer an ideal platform for friends to engage in shared play. Simultaneously, we strongly advocate that parents actively participate in this STEM-driven entertainment, ensuring enjoyable bonding moments with their children.

Spark Creativity with Gemmicc Magnetic Tiles Gemmicc magnetic tiles ignite your children's imagination and creativity. Through the assembly of different magnetic tile shapes, kids can bring to life simple patterns or intricate structures, ranging from castles, houses, and trees to rockets, cars, animals, the sun, and beyond. Elevate your child's creative prowess and foster their capabilities to a higher plane.

Education through Playfulness The pathway to learning is often paved with play. This magnetic tile set serves as an excellent instrument to foster your child's intelligence. Through the creation of various patterns and structures, your youngsters can significantly elevate their hand-eye coordination and aptitude for teamwork.

Crafted by Our Factory Our products are meticulously crafted within our own factory, granting us complete control over every step of production. Stringent regulations guide each process, guaranteeing the utmost quality. All materials are certified BPA and LEAD-free. The magnets are securely sealed using Ultrasonic welding technology, providing a robust bond that ensures the magnets remain firmly in place even when subjected to rough handling. With these measures in place, our products are unequivocally safe for your children. A Beautiful Time for Children to Play and Connect The experience of playing and sharing with peers is a moment of true delight for kids. These magnetic blocks foster unity and provide an alternative to screen time, facilitating the development of various skill sets. Amplified Magnetism for Seamless Building With heightened magnet potency, kids can now construct with remarkable ease and speed. Quality compromise is not in our vocabulary; our mission revolves around presenting children with superlative, inventive toys that redefine excellence.

Discover Gemmicc Your Haven for Premium and Innovative Toys. At Gemmicc, we offer a collection of top-tier, imaginative toys, all self-produced to ensure premium quality. Our global presence extends to numerous countries, as we take pride in providing children with exceptional toys that ignite their creativity, while also sharing our visions and aspirations. Versatile Learning with Magnetic Building Blocks These magnetic building blocks serve multiple purposes, aiding in sorting and stacking. These activities contribute to kids' mathematical understanding while also fostering their grasp of various shapes and colors. Beyond that, the blocks facilitate learning about construction, all the while igniting imagination and nurturing creativity. A thoughtful gift choice for birthdays or Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and it comes with a little “ideas” book.
reviews.reviewText: These are very study and the magnet is safely within the pieces, it has no opening for the magnet to fall out and be swallowed by a child. This pieces are a bit bigger than other sets, which we like that better. We also like that it comes with a nice book with ideas on what to make.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the "future" builder!!!
reviews.reviewText: My 7 year old enjoys building cities. He will use anything and everything to build an entire city! So, I decided that I would try this as a Christmas gift. HE LOVES THEM! I am buying more, because the buildings are getting taller! :DHe's learning and enjoying it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: Let’s be real, these are fun for kids and adults. I would recommend not one box but multiple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Gemmicc Magnetic Tiles for my 3 yr old grandson. He immediately started building a playing with it. I plan to trace out different shapes and letters and have him use the tiles to match the shapes. He is able to use his creativity to build anything imaginable using the magnetic tiles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set for my four-year-old grandson‘s birthday. He has several sets and loves to build things with all of them together. The magnets are strong, so they hold up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Building Blocks
reviews.reviewText: These magnetic blocks are great building blocks for children. They are great for the whole family and they can lead to many options. Kids come up with so many things when they have these blocks as their base. They blocks are magnetic, so it makes it easier for them to build things and make them larger than they normally would.Great set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids LOVE magnetic tiles!
reviews.reviewText: I never know which tile brands to buy when wanting additional tiles for my collection. These seemed to fit the bill. The strength of the magnets was sufficient for building. I gave this set to a 9 year old refugee and he and his family were enthralled with them. To me the magnetic tiles (as long as they are built with quality) are a no-brainer gift for children from 2-20. I teach preschool to 3-5 year olds and magnetic tiles are one of the most popular toys over the years. This brand looked like it would hold up well too. Average size and no opaque pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great magnetic tile for little kid creativity
reviews.reviewText: These Gemmicc Magnetic Tiles are so great for creative little minds. The tiles are extraordinarily engaging and let kids of all ages build and create small blocks or big buildings! the strong magnets keep the project together.The Gemmicc Magnetic Tiles are a great value as well, and are affordable when compared to the well known magnatile type squares.A great gift for the little ones in your life! Easy to recommend!
